title: The white cockade =
author: Grant, James
snippet: Two soldiers had been sent to Auldhame for Dalquharn^s cloak-bag, and from them he learned that Miss Otterburn was at the Spa of Dunse. Old Dame Dorriel sent them back laden with wine and various other good things for the comfort of her imprisoned favourite ; but he never received

title: Early Travellers in Scotland. Edited by P. Hume Brown. [With maps.]
author: Brown, Peter Hume.
snippet: 2 Gosford, near Aberlady. 3 Adam, i.e., Aldham, or Auldhame, a decayed village on the coast of Haddingtonshire.
